description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.5M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Energere Consultants. The average
  contract duration was 9.4 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $8.4M. The longest
  contract was 11.47 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $10.7M.
